Introduction

Kwon Yonghyun, also known as UO, is a South Korean singer-songwriter and member of the boy group XD (formerly XEED).

Originally debuting as a member of the boy group TST under KJ Music Entertainment on January 4, 2017 with the release of the single "Love Story". The group eventually disbanded sometime in October 2020. Sometime in 2023, he announced his solo debut under the stage name UO. He released a pre-release titled "Run For Love" on April 6, 2023 and later officially debuted on the 13th with the release of the mini album "Restart". He later joined the group XEED (now XD) under Nature Space as a new member in July of 2023. He made his debut with the group on August 1, 2023 with the release of the mini album "Blue".

He also appeared as a contestant on JTBC's 2024 survival show PROJECT7.
